Competency Question/Natural Language Sen: A YANG server is accesible through an endpoint composed of URL or IP address and port number
Access to a YANG server requires username and password credentials
Access to data of a YANG server can be filtered using XPath
NETCONF server is a type of YANG server
Access to data of a NETCONF server can be filtered using an XML subtree
A NETCONF server may require a device profile defined by a network vendor
A NETCONF server implements NETCONF capabilities
A NETCONF capability is uniquely identified by a URN
Host key verification can be enabled or disabled to access a NETCONF server
